input:
Person1:       It is reported that the temperature is going to drop dramatically tonight .  
 Person2:Really ?  
 Person1:        Yes . So you'd better dress warmly before you go out .  
 Person2:I will . Thanks for telling me .

Person1:       Would you mind helping us take a picture ?  
 Person2:My pleasure . How do you want me to do it ?  
 Person1:        Just focus on us and press the button .  
 Person2:Ready ? Say cheese .

Person1:       Does your child still believe in Santa Claus ?  
 Person2:Yes . She believes everything about him .  
 Person1:        How sweet .  
 Person2:Yes . If she doesn't believe it , Christmas won't be so exciting to her .  
 Person1:        When are you going to tell her that Santa Claus doesn't exist ?  
 Person2:I'm not going to tell her . She will find out and understand when she grows older .
